title: Golf Tee
summaries: The Golf Tee is a furniture item used in golfing purchased from the Golfer for 1. It assists in placement of Golf Balls, and balls struck from a Golf Tee will travel further.
Pressing the ⚷ Open / Activate button on a Golf Tee places a Golf Ball on top of it.

statistics.Tooltip: Right click to place a golf ball on it
statistics.Buy: 1
statistics.Sell: 20
